code: import React from"react";import{SRLWrapper}from"simple-react-lightbox";import data from"../../data/product.json";import{Col,Container,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import PortfolioOne from"./PortfolioOne";import Spacer from"../common/Spacer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Portfolios(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SRLWrapper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"portfolio",className:"portfolio",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spacer,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{"data-aos":"fade-up",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\xDCR\xDCNLER\u0130M\u0130Z"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:data.map(function(product){var picture=product.picture,title=product.title,desc=product.desc,nav=product.nav,id=product.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,className:"text-center mb-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioOne,{picture:picture,title:title,desc:desc,nav:nav})},id);})})]})]})});}export default Portfolios;
